name: tinglingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that causes a feeling as if a lot of sharp points are being put quickly and lightly into your body: The ball struck me tinglingly on the right elbow. The chilli con carne was tinglingly hot.
in a way that involves strong emotions, such as excitement or fear: When she heard the phone ring she felt tinglingly alive. The race to win the championship has been tinglingly close all year.
More examplesFewer examplesThe fish was served with a tinglingly hot ginger sauce.The orchestra played pleasantly enough and occasionally even tinglingly.I suddenly became tinglingly aware of just how much danger we were in.
